title: Lou Reed - Berlin (A Film by Julian Schnabel)
description:
LOU REED presents BERLIN - A Film by Julian Schnabel (2007)

Recorded live at St. Ann's Warehouse in Brooklyn, New York

A real movie with theatrical release, a trailer (not included) and all.
Lou Reed with his band (including Fernando Saunders and Dick Wagner), horn section and girls choir play through the 1973 album "Berlin" -- with film of the sad heartbreaker Caroline's demise projected over and around the band. Sorta coherent, like the album itself.

MPEG-4 Nero Digital AVC 720x400 
Audio AAC 448 kbps from LPCM 16 bit DVD soundtrack

Lou Reed: in memoriam 1942-2013. This film is a fine tribute to him(self).

Sounds great but you must play it loud and watch the compression settings on your media-playing software, PC volume settings, etc. 

Soundtrack List:

Introduction by director Julian Schnabel
Sad Song
Berlin
Lady Day
Men of Good Fortune
Caroline Says I
How Do You Think It Feels
Oh Jim
Caroline Says II
The Kids
The Bed
Sad Song
Candy Says
Rock Minuet
Sweet Jane (closing credits)
